item.title: Ben Affleck, Matt Damon’s Artists Equity Taps Amy Baer as Film, TV President
item.description: The veteran executive spent 17 years at Sony, overseeing projects such as ‘Moneyball’ and ‘The Pursuit of Happyness.’
